definition: At any given moment; without restriction or limitation; used to express the availability or possibility of something happening or being done at any time. It is commonly used to indicate that someone or something is always ready, accessible, or open for a particular action or event.

examples.german: Ich stehe Ihnen jederzeit zur Verfügung.
examples.english: I am available to you at any time.

examples.german: Er ist jederzeit bereit zu helfen.
examples.english: He is always ready to help.
